title: DisplayFusion Pro v8.0 Final + License Keys and Portable
description:
DisplayFusion Pro 8.0 Final + Portable is a fantastic multi-monitor software to help you set up multiple monitors on your computer. With this application you can easily and quickly work on multiple monitors at the same time. Select active application to run only on one of the monitors connected. This is an extremely convenient and useful, especially when we are working simultaneously with multiple applications (Video production, Trading, CAD designs, etc).

DisplayFusion Pro 8 Serial Key Features:

One of the core modules that are included in the program is a tool for the configuration of monitors. From here we will adjust the resolution, color depth, refresh rate, and the orientation of the individual devices, and even save the settings in the form of profiles of monitors that later we will be able to change the corresponding keyboard shortcut or from the program icon located in the system tray.

In addition, the program supports keyboard shortcuts HotKeys, so that we can easily customize connected monitors using the configured keys. DisplayFusion 8 also allows you to set the wallpaper on your each monitor desktop. You will find many useful features for cropping and scaling the wallpapers.

DisplayFusion 8 Crack Download gives you the ability to configure the display of taskbar and wallpapers that can be displayed as a single entity or as separate components of each of the available desktops. It is also possible to customize each application to run only on one of the available monitors.

In addition, after the installation tools on the title bar of the window running in the system appear special icons, enabling easy switching to a different monitor. DisplayFusion Pro 8 enables you to customize behavior of Windows that you drag to the edge of the screen, their position, set the screen savers for each monitor separately, etc.

Installation Instructions:

1- Open [DisplayFusionSetup-8.0.exe] and install the software.
2- Close Internet connection and use the serial key.
3- Block program with firewall.
4- Enjoy DisplayFusion Pro Latest Full Version
